column5: It was a really scary/sad moment for me when I realized that things I thought to be general personality traits and who I was at my core (shyness, for example) were actually symptoms. I've thought a lot recently about where the line is between "real me" and "trauma me". That line of thinking can kind of drive you crazy, so I've been trying to ditch it and instead focus on who I want "future healed me" to be.
In addition to market place, there are some good housing groups on Facebook - that was how I found my current place. PM me if you'd like more details.
